document_data.name: Mosque of Kossuth
document_data.mainbody:
{{otheruses4|the mosque in [[Krak al-Niraan]]|the mosque in the [[City of Brass]]|Mosque of Kossuth}}
The '''Mosque of Kossuth''' was a temple dedicated to the [[Zakharan pantheon|cold elemental god of fire]] within the fortress of [[Krak al-Niraan]] in the [[Weeping Desert]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description:
The air within the mosque was heavy with incense emanating from five flaming braziers located in each corner and the vaulted center.

A large brazier decorated the center of the mosque. The brazier was actually a ''[[brazier of commanding fire elementals]]'' usable only by skilled [[Elemental mage|flame mages]] or [[holy slayer]]s devoted to Kossuth.
document_data.Inhabitants: Many of the [[Brotherhood of the True Flame]] within Krak al-Niraan, including the fanatical [[Midani dictionary|fedayeen]] of the [[Flamedeath Fellowship]], came to the mosque to worship Kossuth.
document_data.Defenses: Since the mosque was strongly connected to the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]], any [[Flame (province)|flame]]-based attack within the mosque was enhanced.
